pubspec.name: camera
pubspec.description: A Flutter plugin for controlling the camera. Supports previewing the camera feed, capturing images and video, and streaming image buffers to Dart.

pubspec.name: camera
pubspec.author: Flutter Team <flutter-dev@googlegroups.com>
pubspec.description: A Flutter plugin providing access to the device cameras

pubspec.name: camera
pubspec.author: Flutter Team <flutter-dev@googlegroups.com>
pubspec.description: A Flutter plugin for getting information about and controlling the camera on Android and iOS. Supports previewing the camera feed and capturing images.
